description:
With it’s integrated softshell stretch gaiter, the Ribelle Run Kalibra G is built to handle the gnarliest of trails. The BOA® Wrap360 closure system provides a secure closure on the inner shoe and allows for micro-adjustments for a perfect fit. Underfoot traction comes courtesy of the Presa® outsole that is formulated for cold and wet conditions.

  • Integrated softshell stretch gaiter uses Polartec® Windbloc® fabric for protection from snow and moisture
  • Water-resistant zipper with Velcro closure for a secure fit
  • BOA® Wrap 360 Closure System provides a secure fit that allows micro-adjustability on the go
  • Full TPU rands to protect against abrasion
  • Medium density EVA midsole for impact absorption and energy return
  • Ortholite® insole cushions underfoot
  • Vibram® Presa® outsole with 5mm deep lugs and H-Compound rubber is formulated for cold and wet conditions
name: Scarpa Ribelle Run Kalibra G Trail Running Shoes - Unisex
